attributes.action: Allowing Muslims Friday call to prayers
attributes.additional_details: Allowing Muslims Friday call to prayers
attributes.background: In the name of Allah, Most Gracious, Most Merciful

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is a decision for local councils

You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
